title: Sex rules
brief_description: Produced with the assistance of the AIDS Bureau of NSW and explores the personal decision making necessary when becoming involved in sexual relationships and the precautions needed to ensure “safe sex” and avoid AIDS. Teacher preview recommended before screening this video.
